IndexPage.adminDescription: Admin page for viewing survey results.
IndexPage.mainTitle: Assessment of the maturity of public services and the digital maturity of business
IndexPage.mainDescription: Take the test to get a personal assessment of the digital maturity of your business or state. Based on the test results, you will find out what stage of development your company is at, its main “bottleneck” and receive recommendations for its elimination and understand what steps will really bring your business to the next level of efficiency and competitiveness.
